biotools.summary: BiSCoT (Bionano Scaffolding Correction Tool) is a tool that aims to improve the contiguity of scaffolds and contigs generated after a Bionano scaffolding. It looks for enzymatic labelling sites on contigs. If two distinct contigs share labels, BiSCoT merges them at the last shared site.

bioschemas.name: BiSCoT
